appDesc.message: Display ChatGPT response alongside search engine results

ext_cloudflare_login.message: Please login and pass Cloudflare check at

ext_openai_security_check.message: OpenAI requires passing a security check every once in a while. If this keeps happening, change AI provider to OpenAI API in the extension options.

ext_error_generic.message: If this issue persists, please check your API key, model settings, or network connection.

ext_error_network.message: Network error: Please check your internet connection or try again later.

ext_error_model.message: Model error: Please check your model selection in the extension options.

ext_error_apikey.message: API key error: Please check your API key validity and permissions.

ext_provider_openai_api_desc.message: The official OpenAI API. More stable and supports custom models.

ext_api_key_warning1.message: ⚠️ Your API key is stored in your browser's extension storage after being obfuscated (Base64 encoded).

ext_api_key_warning2.message: For your security: do not share your browser profile, remove unused keys, and prefer limited-scope keys.

ext_openai_api_key_guide.message: You can find or create your API key

ext_provider_gemini_api_desc.message: The official Google Gemini API. Fast, powerful, and multimodal.

ext_gemini_api_key_guide.message: You can get your Gemini API key

ext_toast_enter_openai_key.message: Please enter your OpenAI API key

ext_toast_enter_gemini_key.message: Please enter your Gemini API key

ext_apikey_link_to_options.message: Please set it in the options page.

options_promptPrefix_description.message: This content will always be prepended when sending a question to the AI model.
